Room.Name: Second Station of the Oracle
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a paneled room, at the second station of Veratus, the Oracle.
Room.LongDescription: This Grand Cathedral was once the home of several gods from the mountains, but they decided they liked the mountains better than staying here around a bunch of monks who always kept their eyes covered. The monks believed the gods wanted them to do that, but there was a real lack of communication. Veratus can be found here if she liked your first question.
